law.catch_line: Department of Social Services: Social Services Commission.

text.section: There is a Social Services Commission.
The Commission has the powers and duties prescribed by law.

The Commission shall be composed of at least 9 but no more than 13 members, as specified from time to time by Ordinance of the Mayor and City Council. (Res. 02-033, ratified Nov. 5, 2002.)
Department of Education
